highlights: Use Ruby on Rails to create a dashboard that displays information about the status of various supercomputer resources.
Write and publish many features and bug fixes for the OpenOndemand web app, a gateway enabling researchers to utilize the world's most powerful supercomputers.
Created the MongoDB database, Express.js API and the connecting client code for Monkeytype.com, a site that serves over 100k unique visitors each day.
Immediately reduced costs by 70 percent and slowed the rate of increasing cloud service costs.
Worked with the owner/lead developer and a more experienced professional to ensure a smooth deployment.

projects.description: A website where users can store, share, search, discuss, vote on, and manage their ideas.

Congol
projects.description: A website that allows users to play Conway's Game of Life with 2 players competing live over the internet.

projects.name: Stem Player Online
projects.description: A web application that enables users to manipulate their music in a way similar to the popular Stem Player device created by Kanye West. Used by an average of 1000 people per week.

projects.name: 3cards
projects.description: A web3 application that allows users to create and share flashcard sets stored on the Arweave, a decentralized blockchain-like storage network. Won a prize at the Arweave Open Web Hackathon.

projects.name: mathgenerator
projects.description: Created and maintain an open-source python package that generates a wide variety of math problems. Package has 90 stars on Github and has around 1000 downloads per month.

projects.name: Flag Quiz
projects.description: A flutter app where users can test their knowledge of national flags.

projects.name: BeautifulVHS
projects.description: A website that displays a moving, 3d rendering of old vhs covers.

projects.name: Recolorbot
projects.description: A Reddit bot that colors black and white images using an AI image coloring API.

projects.name: Ghlog
projects.description: A command line application to upload journal entries to a Github repository.

highlights: Work to plan weekly meetings and events, creating educational content for club members.
Lead efforts to acquire funding for the club and it's various events.
